title: The Ghost of My Life
original_name: THE GHOST OF MY LIFE ザ・ゴースト・オブ・マイ・ ライフ
sinopse:
Fern had been given talents and extraordinary outlook appearances, however with serious stage fright, he had failed so many auditions therefore had been playing supporting character in a small theatrical company. Suddenly one day, Harold a movie producer came to ask Fern to be the leading character in his film, however after Fern signed the contract, Harold was killed in a mysterious murder. Harold, who supposed to be dead, showed up in front of Fern...

The book has also included other short works of Yamada Mutsuki!

(Source: LiveJournal)
